subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When A.J. Burnett is on, his fastball sizzles, his curveballs snap, and he churns through lineups, making some of baseball’s best hitters, like those on the Tampa Bay Rays, look helpless.
snippet: When A.J. Burnett is on, his fastball sizzles, his curveballs snap, and he churns through lineups, making some of baseball’s best hitters, like those on the Tampa Bay Rays, look helpless.
